1213400.name: VR Fantasy Island
1213400.description:
This is an early stage for the game VR Fantasy Island. We are trying out a concept to see if people would be interested in playing a game like this in VR.
In this game you have to solve some puzzles and locate the missing Gems which are required to proceed through each level. You can perform many activities like picking, throwing and pulling objects and many more. we are also working on bringing activities in our game which we perform in real life. Main motive of our game is to show user's all possibility of Virtual Reality he/she get in VR world. This game also helps improve your Thinking Abilities, Problem Solving and Awareness through the activities and puzzles in the game.
